description: Episode number 4 of Series "The Kindergarten child series". Experience with numbers, dramatic play and concept formation are among the aims behind conducting a store in a classroom situation. Activities include experiment with barter, use of an adding machine and cash register, and the purchase of merchandise. Suitable for teacher/tertiary level.
